content: looking for a sunburst granny square tutorial you ve come to the right place in this step-by-step guide we will show you how to crochet a sunburst granny square that looks like a sunflower this free crochet sunflower pattern is a great project for beginners and it s perfect for using up scrap yarn for this tutorial i ve worked a sunburst design in brown gold yellow and cream to create a sunflower granny square pattern you can use any colors you like or use the same colors as i did to make a sunflower granny square for yourself **finished size** 5-inch square
